org.ardulink.core.messages.api

Interface ToDeviceMessage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Message
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ToDeviceMessageCustom, ToDeviceMessageKeyPress, ToDeviceMessageNoTone, ToDeviceMessagePinStateChange, ToDeviceMessageStartListening, ToDeviceMessageStopListening, ToDeviceMessageTone
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultToDeviceMessageCustom, DefaultToDeviceMessageKeyPress, DefaultToDeviceMessageNoTone, DefaultToDeviceMessagePinStateChange, DefaultToDeviceMessageStartListening, DefaultToDeviceMessageStopListening, DefaultToDeviceMessageTone

    public interface ToDeviceMessage
extends Message

    Ardulink

    v2.0.1 Phoenix

    This marker interface represents an outgoing from Ardulink message. Usually Ardulink sends an outgoind message to an Arduino board (but also to an MQTT broker or Camel route)
